Desc.entry:
Local development agency and registered charity which:  provides services to support the development of voluntary and community organisations  promotes the work of the voluntary and community sector in Sheffield  works with others to increase the influence and involvement of the sector in the city and beyond.
Specialist services include:  Community Accountancy and Payroll Services  HR Advice Service  Legal Advisory Service  Volunteer Centre; training programmes  development support covering all aspects of setting up and running voluntary and community organisations  work around health and community care issues including offering advice and information to people who receive Direct Payments  accommodation (meeting rooms, office space available for hire)  information resources
Works citywide and across the voluntary and community sector, with an emphasis on supporting smaller organisations and self-help groups. Establishes and services voluntary sector forums and networks.
